text: Yang Zhuang stationhttps://www.bjsubway.com/jpg.html () is a station on Line 6 of the Beijing Subway. It was opened on December 30, 2018.http://www.bj.xinhuanet.com/bjyw/2018-12/30/c_1123927578.htm == Station Layout == {|cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100|G |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100|Entrances and Exits |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=350|Exits A-C |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|B1 |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Concourse |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Faregates, Station Agent |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" rowspan=3|B2 |Westbound |← towards Jin'anqiao (Terminus) |- |style="border- right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-top:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;" colspan=2|Island platform, doors open on the left |- |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;"|Eastbound |style="border- bottom:solid 1px gray;"| towards Lucheng (Xihuang Cun) → |} == Exits == {| class="wikitable" !rowspan=5 style="background:#"| !scope="col" style="width:100px;"|Exit !Destination |- |30px5px20px5px 30px |Pingguoyuan South Rd. |- |30px5px20px5px |Pingguoyuan South Rd. |- |30px20px10px 30px |Pingguoyuan South Rd. |- |30px20px10px |Pingguoyuan South Rd. |} == References == * Beijing Subway official map, showing official English name Category:Beijing Subway stations in Shijingshan District Category:Railway stations in China opened in 2018
